A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So it's still a Star Wars movie\, but too many gaping plot holes and some jumping of the shark makes this movie cringeworthy at many times.  Some of the twists I thought were great\, but executed poorly.  Many elements of this movie exist because they have to in order for it to make sense and even then it requires suspension of disbelief at times.  And then there's THAT ONE SCENE.
